Uses of Package
org.autogui.base.mapping

  • Packages that use org.autogui.base.mapping 
    Package Description
    org.autogui.base.mapping  
    org.autogui.swing  
    org.autogui.swing.mapping  
    org.autogui.swing.table  
    org.autogui.swing.util  
  • Classes in org.autogui.base.mapping used by org.autogui.base.mapping 
    Class Description
    GuiMappingContext
    a tree node describing a mapping between GuiTypeElement and GuiRepresentation.
    GuiMappingContext.ContextExecutorService
    a sub-set of ExecutorService as the returned type of GuiMappingContext.getTaskRunner()
    GuiMappingContext.DelayedTask
    a task for update propagation.
    GuiMappingContext.GuiSourceValue
    source value held by a context.
    GuiMappingContext.GuiSourceValueNone
    nothing of source value, can be obtained by GuiMappingContext.NO_SOURCE
    GuiMappingContext.GuiSourceValueObject
    concrete source value
    GuiMappingContext.SourceUpdateListener
    called from GuiMappingContext.updateSourceFromRoot(GuiMappingContext) and GuiMappingContext.updateSourceSubTree().
    GuiPreferences
    the Preferences holder associated to a GuiMappingContext.
    GuiPreferences.GuiValueStore
    the abstract definition of key-value store.
    GuiPreferences.HistoryValueEntry
    an entry of the value history, consisting of a value, an index and a time-stamp, associated with a key-index.
    GuiReprAction
    The abstract action component for an action
    GuiReprActionList
    the abstract action definition for a list (an action taking a list as its argument)
    GuiReprCollectionElement
    elements in a collection table GuiReprCollectionTable.
    GuiReprCollectionTable
    representation for GuiTypeCollection.
    GuiReprCollectionTable.CellValue
    a selected cell value
    GuiReprCollectionTable.ListConverter
    in order to support arrays, the table-representation use a converter for input/output of values.
    GuiReprCollectionTable.ListConverterCast
    a converter for list object.
    GuiReprCollectionTable.TableTarget
    interface for actions which handle selected-rows; an actual implementation relies on a concrete GUI component
    GuiRepresentation
    abstract GUI component: most methods of the interface always take a GuiMappingContext, this is because an instance of the interface might be an singleton instance.
    GuiRepresentation.GuiReprNone
    the empty implementation of the representation
    GuiReprObjectPane
    an object representation composing member sub-representations
    GuiReprPropertyPane
    a property member definition: [propertyName: [ propertyValueField ] ].
    GuiReprSet
    a composition of representations.
    GuiReprValue
    a value component associated with GuiTypeValue.
    GuiReprValue.ObjectSpecifier
    an auxiliary information for specifying a property value.
    GuiReprValue.ObjectSpecifierIndex
    the indexed specifier for specifying an element in a list
    GuiReprValue.ObjectSpecifierNothing
    special specifier, can be obtained by GuiReprValue.NONE
    GuiReprValueNumberSpinner
    a spinner text-field component for a Number or primitive number property
    GuiReprValueNumberSpinner.Infinity
    a comparable infinity representation, which is not a Number type, but comparable to any other types.
    GuiReprValueNumberSpinner.NumberType
    a type information of number.
    GuiReprValueNumberSpinner.NumberTypeBigDecimal
    the number type for BigDecimal
    GuiReprValueNumberSpinner.NumberTypeBigInteger
    the number type for BigInteger
    GuiReprValueNumberSpinner.NumberTypeByte
    the number type for byte
    GuiReprValueNumberSpinner.NumberTypeDefault
    default impl.
    GuiReprValueNumberSpinner.NumberTypeDouble
    the number type for double
    GuiReprValueNumberSpinner.NumberTypeFloat
    the number type for float
    GuiReprValueNumberSpinner.NumberTypeInt
    the number type for int
    GuiReprValueNumberSpinner.NumberTypeLong
    the number type for long
    GuiReprValueNumberSpinner.NumberTypeShort
    the number type for short
    GuiTaskClock
    clock of a context or a view.
    ScheduledTaskRunner
    a delayed task executor accumulating subsequent firing events while the specified delay
  • Classes in org.autogui.base.mapping used by org.autogui.swing 
    Class Description
    GuiMappingContext
    a tree node describing a mapping between GuiTypeElement and GuiRepresentation.
    GuiMappingContext.SourceUpdateListener
    called from GuiMappingContext.updateSourceFromRoot(GuiMappingContext) and GuiMappingContext.updateSourceSubTree().
    GuiPreferences
    the Preferences holder associated to a GuiMappingContext.
    GuiPreferences.HistoryValueEntry
    an entry of the value history, consisting of a value, an index and a time-stamp, associated with a key-index.
    GuiReprCollectionTable.CellValue
    a selected cell value
    GuiReprCollectionTable.TableTarget
    interface for actions which handle selected-rows; an actual implementation relies on a concrete GUI component
    GuiReprCollectionTable.TableTargetCell
    a sub-type of table-target, also supporting selecting partial columns; in the type, GuiReprCollectionTable.TableTarget.getSelectedCells() returns the values of the partial columns.
    GuiReprCollectionTable.TableTargetColumn
    an interface for operating a specific column with selected rows
    GuiRepresentation
    abstract GUI component: most methods of the interface always take a GuiMappingContext, this is because an instance of the interface might be an singleton instance.
    GuiReprSet
    a composition of representations.
    GuiReprValue.ObjectSpecifier
    an auxiliary information for specifying a property value.
    GuiReprValueNumberSpinner
    a spinner text-field component for a Number or primitive number property
    GuiReprValueNumberSpinner.NumberType
    a type information of number.
    GuiTaskClock
    clock of a context or a view.
    ScheduledTaskRunner
    a delayed task executor accumulating subsequent firing events while the specified delay
